name: 吳景龍
objective:
本課程以國內外新聞時事為教材，訓練學生從新聞的字彙入門，並藉由增加詞彙量與練習重要句型，使學生進而能閱讀與理解英文新聞。教材將選自報紙/雜誌（如China Post與Taipei Times雙語新聞）或線上新聞（如VOA Special English）中適合初級學生之各類新聞（如政治、經濟、科技、娛樂與時尚新聞等），以有效提升其基本英文閱聽能力。  

English Description: 
This course aims to use latest and current news as teaching materials to help students build their vocabulary, familiarize themselves with basic sentence patterns and eventually develop their comprehension abilities. News reports suitable for basic-level students will be selected from newspapers or news magazines (e.g. bilingual news from China Post and Taipei Times) and online news websites (e.g. VOA Special English) to effectively enhance students’ fundamental reading skills.
schedule:
Syllabus 課程表:

Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Discuss issues and concepts raised in authentic news articles.
Week 3: Various Kinds of Headlines(1).
Week 4: Various Kinds of Headlines(2).
Week 5: The Special Vocabulary of Headlines.
Week 6: Tips on Reading a News Story (1).
Week 7: Tips on Reading a News Story (2).
Week 8: Tips on Reading a News Story (3). 
Week 9: Midterm Exam or Report.
Week 10: News Story and Journalistic English Vocabularies for Society and Politics.
Week 11: News Story and Journalistic English vocabularies for Weather and Disaster.
Week 12: News Story and Journalistic English vocabularies for Entertainment and Arts.
Week 13: News Story and Journalistic English vocabularies for Businese and Finance.
Week 14: News Story and Journalistic English vocabularies for Technology.
Week 15: News Story and Journalistic English vocabularies for Health and Medicine.
Week 16: Final Group Report (1).
Week 17: Final Group Report (2).
Week 18: Final Group Report (3) or Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Percentile of Fnal Grades(成績配分):
1. Midterm Exam: 20%
2. Group Presentation in the Class or Final Exam:  20 %
3. Attendance, Individual Tasks (Homework, Solo Presentation, or Report), and Participation in the Classroom Discussions: 40 % (Note: Five Absences Leading to Failure) 
4. English Proficiency Test: 20%
